purposeDescriptions.low: gradually increases the fluid pressure within the affected area
purposeDescriptions.mid: rapidly increases the fluid pressure within the affected area, popping eardrums and lowering pressure nearby
purposeDescriptions.high: spikes fluid pressure within the affected area, pulling more fluid from nearby
purposeDescriptions.invLow: gradually decreases the fluid pressure within the affected area
purposeDescriptions.invMid: rapidly depressurizes the affected area, popping eardrums and raising pressure nearby
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: instantly creates a vacuum in the affected area, blasting the removed fluid outwards
